DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if adding paracetamol to ibuprofen is superior to ibuprofen only for treatment of patent ductus arteriosus (PDA) in preterm infants.
DOC.brief_title: Adding Paracetamol to Ibuprofen for Treatment of Patent Ductus Arteriosus in Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized control trial to determine if adding paracetamol to ibuprofen is superior to ibuprofen only for treatment of patent ductus arteriosus (PDA) in preterm infants.
